directions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix cream cheese and Miracle Whip until blended; spread onto bottom of 9-inch pie plate.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes, or until dip is heated through and shredded cheese is melted.
ingredients: 1 (250 g) package PHILADELPHIA Brick Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup KRAFT Creamy Mexicana Shredded Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA
title: Lynn's Layered Nacho Dip
